column3: good grief they get worse, if ain’t broke don’t......
Glad you guys addressed the ridiculousness of not covering the women's race on TV. Who can I write a strongly worded letter to? Loving your efforts! - An LA Chapter member =)
Great content!!!!! Awesome ideas!!!!!!. This will do well
You have to have balls, you have to show your f*cling balls, stop with this Mickey mouse cycling. I kept my car window up so I didn't have to hear their excuses."  Freaking gold Rapha, lol
Best one so far lads, keep it up.

Chapeau! This is hands down, the best cycling movie ever made! (& I've watched a few, hundred..) These two gents had me in stiches! Lighten up roadies - just like Sagan has been trying to tell you forever. The only way this could have been any better was if the world champ did a little Grease cameo. Hint hint.
This could be great, but it's absolutely abysmal instead.
beautiful countryside and race.  lame commentary.
Yay My Podium dogs made it to the film.  Good show lads.
